name: Adrecord Affiliate
author: Adrecord

sections.description:
The plugin will connect your affiliate account at Adrecord to get from there to your WordPress website. You will need an account at Adrecord, and you can sign up for free here. Read more about the terms of service and privacy policy.

Features

  • Get news about new advertiser to work with, right in your WordPress dashboard.
  • Easily make use of Clean links.
sections.installation:
1. Install Adrecord Affiliate Plugin either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server (in the /wp-content/plugins/ directory).
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. After activating the plugin, enter your Adrecord API-key under the plugins settings panel
sections.faq:
Do I need an affiliate account at Adrecord?

Yes, you will need an affiliate account at Adrecord to find this plugin useful. Sign up for free.

Where do I find my API-key?

You will find and be able to generate your API-key in the Adrecord dashboard.

What is Clean Links?

Clean links is a technique to link to an advertiser with “regular links”, you can read more about how it works in the Adrecord dashboard.
